lawName: Allowed construction of new buildings in areas with high or very high fire risk
Allowed construction of new buildings in areas with moderate fire risk
Allowed construction of new buildings in areas with low fire risk
Allowed construction of new buildings in areas with very low fire risk
Minimum protection strip width for areas with forest, shrubs, or natural pastures
Minimum protection strip width for areas with moderate fire risk near agricultural spaces

Minimum protection strip width for areas with very low fire risk near agricultural spaces
Protection strip measured from the outer masonry of the building
Required measures to contain possible sources of ignition in the building and its accesses
Integration of primary or secondary network infrastructure, roadways, or water plans in the protection strip
